Package ooga.model.game_engine

Interface Engine

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameEngine
public interface Engine
Implemented by any type of game engine that is designed to run a specific type of program. The game_engine is the core class that contains all of the references to other classes that are meant to be used in order to give the game_engine its functionality

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addActiveUser​(Player player)
    Adds a player that is playing
    void checkForFinish()
    Checks if a player has one, and makes the appropriate method calls to front end if so
    void checkForNextTurn()
    Checks the rules to see if it's the players next turn, and moves it along if it is
    void saveCurrentState​(java.lang.String fileName)
    Saves the current state of the game in a file
    void setBoard​(GameBoard board)  
    void setRules​(GameRules rules)  
    void startPlayerTimer​(Player player)
    Starts a player's timer
    void stopPlayerTimer​(Player player)
    Stops a player's timer
